summary:
MetaVerse Beyond Imagination where anything is possible. - Metaricaro.com is the Metaverse Based Ecosystem and CARO will be the Reserve Currency for the Whole Ecosystem.

 ABOUT DREAM2EARN PROJECT - Dream2earn (D2E) is Globally Crypto Based mobile gaming platform that offers 6+ games for free download in categories such as sports, card games, Fruit games, puzzle games, action games, and more.

 Metaricaro (CARO) Token - Metaricaro.com is the Metaverse Based Ecosystem and CARO will be the Reserve Currency for the Whole Ecosystem.

 Ricaro Coin - Ricaro Coin is a BEP20 Coin that can be bought in exchange for Binance (BNB).

 Roadmap - This is the first edition of our roadmap

 Token Allocation - A total of 9,99,99,999 Ricaro will be minted and distributed among potential Ricaro holders during various processes.

 Susan J. Newsom - Graphic Designer

 Mary J. Wardle - CPO

 Nicholas M. Sharpe - UI / UX Designer
